searchSql.baseSql: SELECT FIN_ORG_CODE finOrgCode, MORTGAGE_TYPE retaType, DIYA_TYPE diyaType, LOAN_MONEY loanMoney, REST_MONEY restMoney FROM sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#

SELECT cas.BORROWER_NAME borrName, app.APPLY_TIME applyTime, cas.BORRO_MONEY borrMoney, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = cas.COM_ORG_CODE) comOrgName, cas.STOP_REASON stopReason FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON cas.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE WHERE cas.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#

SELECT rap.APPLY_USER APPLY_USER, rap.APPLY_TIME APPLY_TIME, tai.LOAN_MONEY LOAN_MONEY, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = cas.COM_ORG_CODE) FIN_ORG_NAME, cas.STOP_REASON STOP_REASON FROM sctrans.T_RA_APPLY rap LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas ON cas.RANSOM_CODE = rap.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai ON tai.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE WHERE cas.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#

SELECT cas.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, cas.CASE_CODE caseCode, tai.SIGN_TIME signTime, tai.PLAN_TIME planTime, tai.DIYA_TYPE diyaType, app.APPLY_TIME applyTime, (SELECT EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pla.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE AND app.PART_CODE = pla.PART_CODE AND app.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) applyPartTime, inter.INTERVIEW_TIME interTime, (SELECT EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pla.RANSOM_CODE = inter.RANSOM_CODE AND inter.PART_CODE = pla.PART_CODE AND inter.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) interPartTime, rep.REPAY_TIME repayTime, (SELECT EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pla.RANSOM_CODE = rep.RANSOM_CODE AND rep.PART_CODE = pla.PART_CODE AND rep.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) repPartTime, can.CANCEL_TIME cancelTime, (SELECT EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pla.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE AND can.PART_CODE = pla.PART_CODE AND can.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) canPartTime, red.REDEEM_TIME redeemTime, (SELECT EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pla.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE AND red.PART_CODE = pla.PART_CODE AND red.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) redPartTime, pay.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime, (SELECT EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pla.RANSOM_CODE = pay.RANSOM_CODE AND pay.PART_CODE = pla.PART_CODE AND pay.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) payPartTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai ON tai.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON app.RANSOM_CODE = tai.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW inter ON inter.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = inter.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL can ON can.RANSOM_CODE = rep.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM red ON red.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pay ON pay.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE WHERE cas.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#

column.name: repPartTime
column.display: 陪同还贷预计完成时间(一抵)

column.name: canPartTime
column.display: 注销抵押预计完成时间(一抵)

column.name: redPartTime
column.display: 领取产证预计完成时间

column.name: payPartTime
column.display: 回款结清预计完成时间

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT ca.PKID pkid, ca.CASE_CODE caseCode, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR propertyAddr, cai.AGENT_NAME agentName, cai.GRP_NAME grpName, guest.GUEST_NAME seller, guest1.GUEST_NAME buyer, par.USER_NAME userName, par.REAL_NAME realName FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO ca INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON ca.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO cai ON pro.CASE_CODE = cai.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO guest ON cai.CASE_CODE = guest.CASE_CODE and guest.TRANS_POSITION='30006001' INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO guest1 ON cai.CASE_CODE = guest1.CASE_CODE and guest1.TRANS_POSITION='30006002' INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT par ON guest.CASE_CODE = par.CASE_CODE WHERE par.POSITION = 'warrant' <ifNotNull caseCode> AND ca.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND pro.PROPERTY_ADDR = #propertyAddr# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull sellerName> AND guest.GUEST_NAME = #sellerName# </ifNotNull>

SELECT ar.task_def_key_ partCode, ar.NAME_ partName, tw.BUSINESS_KEY processName, ap.APPLY_TIME applyTime, DATEDIFF(DAY,(select pla.EST_PART_TIME from sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE ap.RANSOM_CODE = pla.RANSOM_CODE AND pla.PART_CODE = ap.PART_CODE),GETDATE()) applyEstTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = ap.UPDATE_USER AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) applyName, si.INTERVIEW_TIME signTime, DATEDIFF(DAY,(select pla.EST_PART_TIME from sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE si.RANSOM_CODE = pla.RANSOM_CODE AND pla.PART_CODE = si.PART_CODE),GETDATE()) signEstTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = si.UPDATE_USER AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) signName, ci.CANCEL_TIME cencelTime, DATEDIFF(DAY,(select pla.EST_PART_TIME from sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE ci.RANSOM_CODE = pla.RANSOM_CODE AND pla.PART_CODE = ci.PART_CODE),GETDATE()) cancelEstTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = ci.UPDATE_USER AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) cancelName, ri.REPAY_TIME repayTime, DATEDIFF(DAY,(select pla.EST_PART_TIME from sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE ri.RANSOM_CODE = pla.RANSOM_CODE AND pla.PART_CODE = ri.PART_CODE),GETDATE()) repayEstTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = ri.UPDATE_USER AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) repayName, re.REDEEM_TIME redeemTime, DATEDIFF(DAY,(select pla.EST_PART_TIME from sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE re.RANSOM_CODE = pla.RANSOM_CODE AND pla.PART_CODE = re.PART_CODE),GETDATE()) redeemEstTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = re.UPDATE_USER AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) redeemName, pi.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime, DATEDIFF(DAY,(select pla.EST_PART_TIME from sctrans.T_RA_PLAN pla WHERE pi.RANSOM_CODE = pla.RANSOM_CODE AND pla.PART_CODE = pi.PART_CODE),GETDATE()) paymentEstTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = pi.UPDATE_USER AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#) paymentName, tw.STATUS status FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ar ON ar.PROC_INST_ID_ = tw.INST_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CASE ra ON tw.BIZ_CODE = ra.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY ap ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = ap.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW si ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = si.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY ri ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = ri.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL ci ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = ci.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM re ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = re.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pi ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = pi.RANSOM_CODE
WHERE tw.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# <ifNotNull process> AND tw.BUSINESS_KEY = 'ransom_process' </ifNotNull>
